mapper.insert: insert into account(id, pw, name, email, phone_number, interest_location) values(#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{interestLocation})
mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from account where id=#{id};
mapper.update: update account set name=#{name}, email=#{email}, phone_number=#{phoneNumber}, interest_location=#{interestLocation} where id=#{id}
